sentence.Network_en: His opponents still say he's a fundamentally untrustworthy figure.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的对手依然说他根本不可信。

sentence.Network_en: You can't go by what he says; he's very untrustworthy.
sentence.Network_cn: 你不能根据他的话判断, 他是很不可靠的.

sentence.Network_en: I think he is shallow, vain and untrustworthy.
sentence.Network_cn: 我认为他肤浅、自负、不可靠。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 靠的组词、用法... ... ◎ 靠 kào ◎ 靠不住[ undependable;unreliable;untrustworthy] ◎ 靠得住[ reliable;dependable;trustworthy].
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(U2) ... untrue 不真实的 untrustworthy 靠不住的 untruth 不真实.
社会工作专业英语词汇(U) ... untreated 未治疗的 untrustworthy 不可靠的 untruthful 不诚实的.
Business Jargon 商业行话 ... a lack of confidence 缺乏信心 untrustworthy 不值得信任的 cover something up 掩盖什么东西.

list.abs: none of us could persuade him out of lending his money to that untrustworthy man .我们谁都不能说服他不要借钱给那个不可靠的人。
Lacking a sense of responsibility ; unreliable or untrustworthy ., 不可靠的缺乏责任心 ; 不可靠或不值得信赖的.
we discovered him to be quite untrustworthy ., 我们发现他很不可信赖.
That man is absolutely untrustworthy ., 那个人绝对不可靠.

entry.def: If you say that someone is untrustworthy, you think they are unreliable and cannot be trusted.

example.ex: I think he is shallow, vain and untrustworthy...
example.tran: 我觉得他为人浅薄，好虚荣，靠不住。

example.ex: His opponents still say he's a fundamentally untrustworthy figure.
example.tran: 他的对手依然说他根本不可信。

means.word_mean: 1. not worthy of trust or belief;

auth_sentence.content: Surely, the untrustworthy would have attempted to appear trustworthy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Surely, the untrustworthy would have attempted to appear trustworthy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Surely, the untrustworthy would have attempted to appear trustworthy.

auth_sentence.content: He also blasts the Chinese judicial system as being untrustworthy.
auth_sentence.res_content: He also blasts the Chinese judicial system as being untrustworthy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He also blasts the Chinese judicial system as being untrustworthy.

auth_sentence.content: Granted, on paper, it all sounds a bit untrustworthy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Granted, on paper, it all sounds a bit untrustworthy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Granted, on paper, it all sounds a bit untrustworthy.

Sentence.sentence: He finds many of its users untrustworthy.
They find many of the banks untrustworthy.
